casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Anthony CLEGG. No. 101P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Chrstopher Anthony Clegg, Raleigh, for Clegg, Christopher Anthony. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of October 2015 by Defendant for Beal of Particulars and Probable Cause Indictment:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
